description: This creates a new invoice unit with the provided definition.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The unique name of the invoice unit that is shown on the generated invoice. This can't be changed once it is set. To change this name, you must delete the invoice unit recreate.

parameters.name: InvoiceReceiver
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID chosen to be the receiver of an invoice unit. All invoices generated for that invoice unit will be sent to this account ID.

parameters.name: Rule
parameters.description: The InvoiceUnitRule object used to create invoice units. LinkedAccounts (list) --- The list of LINKED_ACCOUNT IDs where charges are included within the invoice unit. (string) ---

nested_params.name: LinkedAccounts
nested_params.description: The list of LINKED_ACCOUNT IDs where charges are included within the invoice unit.

parameters.name: ResourceTags
parameters.description: The tag structure that contains a tag key and value. (dict) --- The tag structure that contains a tag key and value. The object key of your of your resource tag. The specific value of the resource tag.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The object key of your of your resource tag.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The specific value of the resource tag.

nested_items.name: InvoiceUnitArn
nested_items.description: The ARN to identify an invoice unit. This information can't be modified or deleted.
